entry.title: Best Robotic Competition
entry.content:
Best Robotics We are coming!

The Perkiomen School Robotics Club is slowly generating more and more excitement. We are gathering for the preparation of the Best Robotics Competition. The Perkiomen School’s Robotics Club, made up of a collection of students interested in robotics, are gearing up for the competition and can’t wait to showcase their skills in this upcoming event.
People Involved: Frank, Bruce, Calista, John D., Liam, Doris, Wade, Forest, Tony, Sidd, Will, Eric, Sarah, John Z. and Rachel.
All of these people are members of the Robotics Club and all participate for different cultures.

Why we do this: Team work that gets built along the way. struggling together to build the thing. like the moment in which something that wasnt working starts to work, the team buliding along the way,
We really like Robotics.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: We are the Perkiomen Robotics Team. We love ourselves and the world.
